<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Incredible Megafauna Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3448) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 78</row>

**Archetype** [Mammoth Lord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=170)

**Prerequisites**
[Mature Megafauna Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3445)

</column>

---

Under your care and training, your megafauna companion has realized its innate potential. Your companion becomes an [indomitable](/AnimalCompanions.aspx?ID=3&Advanced=true) or [savage](/AnimalCompanions.aspx?ID=1&Advanced=true) animal companion (your choice), gaining additional abilities determined by the type of companion.
name: Incredible Megafauna Companion
